title: "Do-it-yourself": Vaccine rejection and complementary and al
author: Attwell; Katie; Ward; Paul R; Meyer; Samantha B; Rokkas; Philippa J; Leask; Julie
description: In this article, we elucidate a symbiotic relationship between complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) and rejection of, or hesitancy towards, vaccination. In Fremantle, Western Australia, and Ad
